# Software

1. **sceptre**: Robustly infer regulatory relationships in single-cell CRISPR screens. [[Web](https://katsevich-lab.github.io/sceptre/)] [[Github](https://github.com/katsevich-lab/sceptre)]

2. **ondisc**: Fast, universal, and intuitive computing on large-scale single-cell data. [[CRAN](https://cloud.r-project.org/web/packages/ondisc/index.html)] [[Web](https://timothy-barry.github.io/ondisc/)] [[Github](https://github.com/timothy-barry/ondisc)]
